pt.iul.poo.imagewindow

Class GameWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.iul.poo.imagewindow.GameWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener, Displayer, GameWindowInterface

    public class GameWindow
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameWindowInterface, Displayer, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    A GameWindow will display a window with two areas the main area will display figures (either SimpleImage or MovingImage). An area bellow displays messages.

        public void remove(DisplayableElement element)
